title: Drawing, "Desk: Seating at Center, Center Drawer, Adjacent Drawer Stacked on Larger Drawer-Left and Right-with Superimposed Reverse U-Shaped Hardware", 1930s
markings: Stamped in black ink: at upper left, DONALD DESKEY/ ASSOCIATES; at lower right, DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed:
Inscribed dimensions in graphite throughout. Inscribed in graphite: at lower center, 
Oriental w[ood] & Ebonized Bl[ack]??: at upper right

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Desk: Seating at Center, Center Drawer, Adjacent Drawer Stacked on Larger Drawer-Left and Right-with Superimposed Reverse U-Shaped Hardware", 1930s.
1930s. Graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1761.
